name: arch::kernel::acpi::AcpiInfo
doc_adt:
The platform information provided by the ACPI tables.

 Currently, this structure contains only a limited set of fields, far fewer than those in all
 ACPI tables. However, the goal is to expand it properly to keep the simplicity of the OSTD code
 while enabling OSTD users to safely retrieve information from the ACPI tables.

VariantIdx(None)-FieldIdx(Some(0)).name: century_register
VariantIdx(None)-FieldIdx(Some(0)).doc: The RTC CMOS RAM index to the century of data value; the "CENTURY" field in the FADT.

VariantIdx(None)-FieldIdx(Some(1)).name: boot_flags
VariantIdx(None)-FieldIdx(Some(1)).doc: IA-PC Boot Architecture Flags; the "IAPC_BOOT_ARCH" field in the FADT.

VariantIdx(None)-FieldIdx(Some(2)).name: reset_port_and_val
VariantIdx(None)-FieldIdx(Some(2)).doc: An I/O port to reset the machine by writing the specified value.
